name: TableRowSelector
desc: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a row.

items.name: descriptor
items.desc: A string that specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All rows for this data descriptor will be selected. See DataDescriptor.When dataOrientation is set to horizontal, which is not the default each row displays data for one data descriptor. See DataTable.

items.name: even
items.desc: A Boolean value when true, selects the even rows.

items.name: odd
items.desc: A Boolean value when true, selects the odd rows.

items.name: rowIndex
items.desc: A number that specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of 0. The specified column is selected.
